Description: Foot and wall sherd of East Greek (North Ionian?) pottery bowl; plain ring foot; interior: glazed dark brown with reserved tondo decorated with a seven-petal rosette; reserved on the outside save band on lower wall; inscription cut on the outside.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), temenos (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.359)
